name: Stony Rapids
description:
Welcome to Stony Rapids,

It's a 3D game. Stony Rapids is a real place located in Canada, Saskatchewan.  the game is set in December 11, 2039.

The RCMP in the west have been replaced by machines. By mid 2030s the RCMP AI breakout hit western Saskatchewan. the prime minister of Saskatchewan Scott Moe. Declared the beginning of artificial intelligent world war 3.

Player's jobs is to activate the beacons all across the map and find the abended office for more information. 

After activating all five beacons the player's job is to use the main laptop to upload and deactivate the AI by using the satellite. The player is to find who started the artificial intelligent world war.
